body: At 4th level, a reincarnated druid gains a +4 bonus on saving throws against death effects, energy drain, and necromancy effects, and on stabilization checks when dying. This ability replaces resist nature's lure.
name: Resist Death's Touch
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Reincarnated Druid/Resist Deaths Touch
